name: European Chiropractors' Union
goal: The European Chiropractors' Union (ECU) is established to promote the development of Chiropractic in Europe as a science and a profession by research, teaching, publications and legal activities. It represents the Chiropractic profession in Europe on a supranational level.
interests: Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation
euInitiatives: Promoting the health benefits of chiropractic, high standards of education and excellence in conduct and practice. The ECU also represents the interests of the profession at a European level, advocating the inclusion of chiropractic within health policies and health programmes.
